body:
Fixes #12020 

### Before

```console
$ spack versions r-broom
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  0.4.2
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  0.5.1  0.5.0  0.4.5  0.4.4  0.4.3  0.4.1  0.4.0  0.3.7  0.3.6  0.3.5  0.3.4
$ spack checksum r-broom
==> Found 12 versions of r-broom:
  
  0.5.1  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.5.1.tar.gz
  0.5.0  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.5.0.tar.gz
  0.4.5  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.5.tar.gz
  0.4.4  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.4.tar.gz
  0.4.3  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.3.tar.gz
  0.4.2  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.2.tar.gz
  0.4.1  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.1.tar.gz
  0.4.0  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.0.tar.gz
  0.3.7  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.3.7.tar.gz
  ...
  0.3.4  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.3.4.tar.gz

==> How many would you like to checksum? (default is 1, q to abort)
```
### After
```console
$ spack versions r-broom
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  0.4.2
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  0.5.2  0.5.1  0.5.0  0.4.5  0.4.4  0.4.3  0.4.1  0.4.0  0.3.7  0.3.6  0.3.5  0.3.4
$ spack checksum r-broom
==> Found 13 versions of r-broom:
  
  0.5.2  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/broom_0.5.2.tar.gz
  0.5.1  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.5.1.tar.gz
  0.5.0  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.5.0.tar.gz
  0.4.5  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.5.tar.gz
  0.4.4  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.4.tar.gz
  0.4.3  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.3.tar.gz
  0.4.2  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.2.tar.gz
  0.4.1  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.1.tar.gz
  0.4.0  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.4.0.tar.gz
  ...
  0.3.4  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/broom/broom_0.3.4.tar.gz

==> How many would you like to checksum? (default is 1, q to abort)
```
@glennpj
title: Fix version scraping for CRAN packages
